attributes.action: No prosperity due tp 7 years austerity a vote of/no confidence by the UK people.
attributes.additional_details:
Prosperity policy= prosperous 

A policy of austerity to gain prosperity was a shot in the dark at best from the beginning. i want to aim for the light.

A disruptive/undermining/unruly, uncivil motive holds no ground hear.
Democracy i beleive.

It is exactly as stated. A vote of confidence or a vote of no confidence by the people for the people.

The people rule, have, do and always will. 

Fair is fair and only a majority is fair.

Democracy i beleive.

Thank you

#livestrong
attributes.background:
7 years of hell. Now a divided cabinet. This will not stand

If your going through hell, Just keep going.
Never, never, never give up.

I as an English born man beleive the reason for the vote is vastly more important than my story that is still being written.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you'd concerned abut austerity, but we're not sure what you'd like Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the Government or Parliament to spend more on particular services, if that's what you'd like to happen.
